title: Crashing from Rune page
body:
Every time I touch my runes page, whether its without queuing, during queuing, and in champion select, my game will stop loading and I receive a penalty, for not choosing my champion or not accepting a match.

I've troubleshooted my game and nothing happened.... My friends are not receiving this problem? My computer runs multiple MOBA games (Dota, Smite, OverWatch & etc) fine, this is the first time something like this happens in LoL for me.

replies.body:
Hey, that's pretty frustrating and I don't recommend queueing up again until this is fixed up.  Stick to customs for now and see if our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help with a repair or force repatch.  You might have bad game assets that causing issues with the client during champion select.  Enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode might help as well if your PC is getting stressed.  

Let me know if any of these help, but make sure to do it in custom!
